grp.esql:
SELECT 'oracle_ebs' as dept_id,
'oracle_ebs' as dept_name,
null as parent_dept_id,
'Oracle EBS users' description
FROM DUAL

usr.esql:
select 
user_name userid, web_password password, '' email, user_name fullname,
'oracle_ebs' dept_id,
user_id ebs_login_id,
to_char(end_date, 'yyyymmdd') ebs_expire_date,
description ebs_desc
from fnd_user
where user_name like 'SYS%'

role.esql:
SELECT  fu.USER_NAME userid,
               frt.RESPONSIBILITY_NAME role_name,
               frt.description description
  FROM FND_USER_RESP_GROUPS furg,
              FND_USER fu,
              FND_RESPONSIBILITY_TL frt
 WHERE furg.USER_ID = fu.USER_ID
   AND    furg.RESPONSIBILITY_ID = frt.RESPONSIBILITY_ID
   AND furg.user_id is not null
--   AND fu.user_name='SYSADMIN'
ORDER BY fu.USER_NAME
